headline: Is General Mills (GIS) Now Attractive After A 22% One Year Share Price Decline
summary: If you are wondering whether General Mills shares are starting to look interesting at current levels, this article will walk through what the numbers are really saying about the stock's value. The share price recently closed at US$45.72, with returns of a 2.6% decline over 7 days, a 0.5% decline over 30 days and flat performance year to date, alongside a 22.3% decline over 1 year, 40.1% decline over 3 years and 3.1% decline over 5 years. This naturally raises questions about whether...
